hadith.chapter: The Book Pertaining to Repentance and Exhortation to Repentance - كتاب التوبة
hadith.arabic-text: وحدثناه محمد بن عبد الأعلى، حدثنا المعتمر، عن أبيه، بهذا الإسناد ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: This hadith has been transmitted on the authority of Mu'tamir, reported on the authority of his father.
